content: The files category_theory/groupoid and category_theory/Groupoid differ by the case of one character. This is apparently a problem on older macs, which are case insensitive. I guess this needs to be changed.
This didn't cause problems on windows? It's also case-insensitive
Did you ever checkout that commit? It was only like that for half a day.
Oh no, I was just wondering where else it could be problematic.
